mapper.select: SELECT BO_NUM, BO_ID, BO_TITLE, BO_NICKNAME, BO_PRICE, BO_CONTENT, BO_REGDATE, bo_image1, BO_CATEGORY, BO_ADDRESS1, BO_ADDRESS2, HE_BO_NUM, HE_ID, HE_NICKNAME, HE_HEARTDATE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY HE_HEARTDATE DESC) RN, BO_NUM, BO_ID, BO_TITLE, BO_NICKNAME, BO_PRICE, BO_CONTENT, BO_REGDATE, bo_image1, BO_CATEGORY, BO_ADDRESS1, BO_ADDRESS2, HE_BO_NUM, HE_ID, HE_NICKNAME, HE_HEARTDATE FROM MARKETBOARD, HEARTBOARD WHERE HE_ID = #{my_id} AND BO_NUM = HE_BO_NUM ORDER BY HE_HEARTDATE DESC ) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{cri.pageNum} - 1) * #{cri.amount} + 1 AND #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HEARTBOARD WHERE HE_BO_NUM = #{hvo.he_bo_num} AND HE_ID = #{hvo.he_id}
